name: Kotnetcli
tagline: An easy automated way to log in on Kotnet.
body:
## Installation

    $ sudo apt-get install python-pip
    $ sudo pip install mechanize keyring notify2 \
      colorama python2-pythondialog beautifulsoup4


    $ git clone https://github.com/GijsTimmers/kotnetcli.git
    $ cd kotnetcli
    $ ./kotnetcli.py

## Authors

`kotnetcli` is written by [Gijs Timmers](https://github.com/GijsTimmers) 
and [Jo Van Bulck](https://github.com/jovanbulck). Enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
